Magic Method Monday: Descriptors

12.13.2010 at 04:19 AM in Python, Programming, Magic Method Monday | View Comments

Descriptors are classes which, when accessed through either getting, setting, or deleting, can also alter other objects. Descriptors aren't meant to stand alone; rather, they're meant to be held by an owner class. Descriptors can be useful when building object-oriented databases or classes that have attributes whose values are dependent...
